dict.acceptation: 小包；信息包；邮船；大笔款项；

sent.orig: Virtual-packet concept and Virtual-packet switching (VPS) mechanism are proposed.
sent.trans: 提出了“虚分组”概念和“虚分组交换(VPS,Virtual-packet Switching)”机制。

sent.orig: Guaranteed QoS includes three basic parameters: packet transfer delay, packet delay variation and packet loss rate.
sent.trans: 有保证的服务品质包含三种参数：封包传输延迟、封包延迟变异，以及封包遗失率。

sent.orig: Taking aim at the packet mis-sequencing problem of the packet scheduling algorithm in terabit routers.
sent.trans: 研究了基于多级交换结构的太比特路由器分组调度算法。

sent.orig: IPv6 also includes improved packet headers, which are quite different from IPv4's packet headers.
sent.trans: IPv6还包含了改进的包报头，它与IPv4的包报头差别很大。

sent.orig: Packet Length Start: Sets the minimum packet size for the rule.
sent.trans: 包长度的开始：套最小包大小为统治。
